original_title: Eric Clapton & Buddy Guy - South Bank Session
overview: Eric Clapton and Buddy Guy Ronnie Scotts London, England October 6th 1987  "The South Bank Session" South Bank Show Special LWT (UK) Broadcast October 6th 1987  Copies of "THIS CAPTURE" have never been circulated in any form
title: Eric Clapton & Buddy Guy - South Bank Session
